title: The best players who might be available at the NFL trade deadline: Our 1-25 ranking
content: Here's how the top trade candidates -- including Trey Hendrickson, Chris Olave and even Mark Andrews -- stack up. Who is the top target to land before Nov. 4?

title: SGA's winning FTs put bow on 35-point ring night
content: On a night the Thunder received their championship rings, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander finished in style by hitting two free throws to lift Oklahoma City to a 125-124 double-overtime win over the Rockets.

title: QB Wilson calls out ex-coach Payton as 'classless'
content: Russell Wilson called out Sean Payton on social media after his former coach said after Sunday's game that he told Giants owner John Mara that he wished the team had waited to change quarterbacks until after they played the Broncos.

title: Steady Butler, 'matured' Kuminga lift Warriors
content: Jimmy Butler, with a focus on getting to the line and making free throws, and Jonathan Kuminga, with an offseason contract standoff behind him, helped lead the Warriors to a season-opening win over the Lakers.

title: Durant pins 2OT loss on himself in Rockets debut
content: In his debut with Houston on Tuesday, Kevin Durant blamed himself for the Rockets' 125-124, double-overtime loss to the defending champion Oklahoma City Thunder at Paycom Center, telling reporters that he made "two plays" that were "the reason we lost."

title: Trout: Was alerted to Kay's possible drug abuse
content: Mike Trout testified that he was alerted by a team employee to possible concerns about drug abuse by convicted ex-Angels communication director Eric Kay.

title: Marchand emotional in 'touching' return to Boston
content: Brad Marchand appeared to be holding back tears on the ice when the TD Garden crowd gave him a standing ovation Tuesday night during his first game as a Bruins opponent.

title: Izzo blasts NCAA for 'ridiculous' G League ruling
content: In the wake of two former G League players committing to play for Division I schools, Michigan State coach Tom Izzo sounded off Tuesday on the NCAA powerbrokers who've allowed those moves to happen.

title: Raiders' Meyers 'for sure' still wants to be traded
content: Raiders wide receiver Jakobi Meyers is standing firm with his request to be traded from the team with the NFL's Nov. 4 trade deadline approaching.

title: 💪 Latest NFL Power Rankings
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 8. Plus, here are the unsung role players and nonstarters on each roster.

title: Ohtani, Vlad ... and then who? Player rankings and superlatives for the 2025 World Series
content: Here's how the Dodgers' and Blue Jays' rosters stack up and who is primed to do the most jaw-dropping things on the sport's biggest stage.

title: A shocking comeback and a meme: Remembering 'Surrender Cobra' 10 years later
content: A stunning finish cemented Michigan State player Jalen Watts-Jackson and Michigan fan Chris Baldwin into college football history.

title: Bilas' men's basketball 2025 preseason All-America teams
content: From three transfers on the first team to four freshmen on the second, here are Jay Bilas' preseason All-America teams.

title: Conference player of the year picks
content: From teammates to contenders for the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NBA draft, here are the frontrunners in each league.

title: Why it's now -- or maybe never -- for the Cavaliers and Knicks
content: Even if the devastating injuries to Jayson Tatum, Damian Lillard Tyrese Haliburton, opened the championship door wide open for Cleveland and New York, it might close just as quickly. Here's why.

title: Kung fu, meditation and a 'Dream Shake': Inside Victor Wembanyama's return
content: A "traumatic experience" with deep vein thrombosis prompted a summer of exploration for the Spurs star.

title: Is your NBA team built to win a title now or later? Where all 30 teams stack up
content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram analyzes our Now or Later rankings, where the first-place team is the most desperate to win now and the 30th-place franchise is the most content to win later.

title: The U is back ... in the Bottom 10
content: As has become a midseason ritual, Miami suffered a loss it probably shouldn't have and ended up on our list.

title: From the Game 1 guy to the six-pitch magician: Your complete guide to the Dodgers' unhittable, ace-filled rotation
content: Snell, Yamamoto, Glasnow and Ohtani have carried L.A. this October. Here's how to appreciate them in the World Series.

title: Why the Mariners are built to be back after a crushing ALCS loss
content: The 2025 season was the closest Seattle has come to the World Series -- and the team believes the best is yet to come.

title: Why Barça vs. Villarreal in Miami was cancelled
content: Less than two weeks after LaLiga said Barcelona would play Villarreal in Miami, the first regular-season game abroad has been scrapped. What happened?

title: Matchup rankings: Upgrade Bo Nix, downgrade Quinshon Judkins
content: The most and least favorable matchups in the NFL for this week's games at the four key fantasy positions: QB, RB, WR and TE.

title: Top waiver-wire options range from old (Flacco) to new (Monangai)
content: Highlighting available free agent options after a weekend of surprising performances ahead of Week 8.

title: NFL replay review success rates have skyrocketed. A new camera feed may be why
content: Replay challenge success rates have increased by about half this year, largely fueled by a new camera angle.

title: How to watch 'Inside the NBA' on ESPN: 2025-26 schedule
content: The 21-time Emmy Award-winning "Inside the NBA" studio show returns as the pregame, halftime and postgame show for ESPN and ABC's NBA coverage during the 2025-26 season.

title: Wetzel: How a flood of cash brought college football chaos
content: The margins are thin in college football today, and the coach buyouts are huge. Welcome to the chaos.

title: Championship picture, schedule, stats and facts
content: Formula 1 ventures to Mexico City for round 20 of the 2025 season. Find out how the championship shapes up and everything you need to know for the weekend.

title: NBA season preview: Thunder lead loaded West; Flagg in a class of his own
content: Doug Greenberg explores the NBA betting storylines heading into the season, including the Thunder as heavy favorites and how sportsbooks are handling Cooper Flagg.

title: NFL Week 8: Colts huge favorites; Rodgers, Steelers underdogs to Packers
content: Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers are home underdogs to the Packers, and Bears-Ravens has the highest total.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Ranking the 10 greatest NWSL teams of all time: Who's No. 1?
content: Let's rank the 10 best NWSL teams since the league launched in 2013. How many Portland Thorns, Seattle Reign and Orlando Pride squads make the list?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United target Barcelona's Lewandowski
content: Manchester United could sign Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski as a free agent in the summer. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Mid-air scare: IndiGo flight suffers fuel leak; makes emergency landing in Varanasi
content: An IndiGo flight from Kolkata to Srinagar, Flight 6E-6961, made an emergency landing in Varanasi due to a detected fuel leak. All 166 passengers and crew were safely evacuated without injuries. Airport operations have resumed as authorities investigate the cause of the leak.

title: 'Not even Magnus Carlsen': How Norway Chess did what Freestyle couldn't - exclusive
content: In a twist that’s shaken up the global chess scene, Norway Chess has pulled off what even Magnus Carlsen’s Freestyle tour couldn’t, convincing FIDE to approve a brand-new World Championship title. The “Total Chess World Championship” marks a stunning power play that could redefine how elite chess is played and governed.

title: 'Locked him in for days': Big revelation by ex-DGP held in son's death case
content: Former Punjab DGP Mohammad Mustafa and his wife, Razia Sultana, are under probe for their son's death, which they attribute to drug overdose. Mustafa revealed his son's 18-year drug addiction and violent episodes, claiming a video alleging foul play was a product of his son's psychotic disorder and is being misused.

title: Why Europe's fight with Chinese chip company Nexperia has 'worried' auto giants
content: China's new export restrictions on automotive chips, following the Dutch government's intervention in Nexperia, have sent shockwaves through global automakers like GM and Volkswagen. The move, a response to "serious governance shortcomings" at Nexperia, threatens to disrupt vehicle production as companies warn of potential shortages lasting only weeks, with sourcing alternatives taking months.

title: 'If you want trophy': New twist in Asia Cup row; Naqvi sends stern message to BCCI
content: A dispute has erupted between the BCCI and PCB over the Asia Cup trophy presentation. PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi insists on personally handing the trophy to India in Dubai on November 10, following India's refusal to accept it from him after their win. This stems from tensions between the Indian team and the ACC president.

title: British Raj in Australia? Team India head to favourite restaurant to celebrate Diwali - watch
content: Team India celebrated Diwali together at Adelaide's British Raj restaurant, boosting morale after their ODI series opener loss. Players like Kohli and Rohit Sharma were seen interacting with fans. This pre-match dinner aims to foster team bonding and a renewed focus for the crucial second ODI at Adelaide Oval, where India seeks to level the series.

title: ChatGPT gets browser: Google loses $150B; Chrome monopoly threat
content: OpenAI's new AI browser, ChatGPT Atlas, has shaken the tech world.  The launch caused a massive $150 billion drop in Alphabet's market value.  CEO Sam Altman called it a rare chance to redefine web browsing.  Atlas integrates ChatGPT directly, allowing AI to perform tasks.  This poses a significant challenge to Google's search advertising revenue.  Investors are watching closely as Google also integrates AI into its Chrome browser.  The competition for browser dominance is heating up.

title: History made! 38-year-old debutant shocks cricket world; breaks 92-year-old record
content: Pakistan's Asif Afridi etched his name in cricket history, becoming the oldest debutant to claim a five-wicket haul at 38. Despite his impressive feat, South Africa's tailenders fought back, reducing the deficit. Afridi's remarkable performance places him among elite Pakistani spinners, surpassing a 92-year-old record.

title: Travis Kelce, Mahomes’ 1587 Prime slammed over $16 menu item
content: NFL stars Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce's upscale steakhouse, 1587 Prime, is facing online ridicule after a viral photo showcased $16 mashed potatoes.  Launched with significant fanfare, the restaurant's pricing and food quality are now under intense scrutiny, sparking a debate about celebrity-driven ventures versus genuine culinary value. This marks the venture's first public criticism.

title: Big changes in IT Rules soon? Centre mulls tweaks - AI, deepfakes in focus
content: India's IT ministry is proposing new rules to combat AI-generated deepfakes and synthetic content. Social media giants with over 50 lakh users must identify and label artificial content, ensuring users can distinguish it from reality. These measures aim to boost accountability and user awareness amidst growing concerns over AI misuse.

title: Watch: Shots fired outside Serbian parliament; President calls it 'terrorist attack'
content: Shots were fired outside Serbia's parliament in Belgrade, injuring one person and prompting President Aleksandar Vucic to label it a "terrorist attack." A video captured security officers near a tent, followed by gunfire and a fire. The injured man is in stable condition, and authorities are investigating the incident.

title: ‘Kantara: Chapter 1’ BO collection day 21 - Rishab Shetty-starrer crosses Rs 550 cr mark
content: Rishab Shetty's 'Kantara: Chapter 1' is a box office sensation, crossing ₹550 crore in India three weeks post-release. Its strong performance through Diwali, with significant earnings daily, highlights its pan-India appeal beyond Karnataka. The film's universal themes resonate widely, impacting its OTT release date, which is now uncertain due to continued theatrical success.

title: Delhi had a blast: In Karol Bagh, it was a scream! Stations exceeded standard decibel levels
content: Delhi's Diwali festivities ringing in this year brought an unexpected surge of noise, with several monitoring stations recording decibel levels well beyond what is legally acceptable. Even with a green cracker initiative and allotted hours for bursting, the decibel meter was pushed to its limits, particularly from 9 pm until 11 pm, spilling over into the night across many regions.

title: Yogi Adityanath defends Halal ban; says ended Eid milan tradition at CM house
content: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath defended the state's ban on Halal-certified products, alleging funds were misused for terrorism, 'love jihad,' and conversions. He stated these certifications operate as an unregulated system, earning significant amounts without official recognition. Adityanath also discussed the secularization of official events, emphasizing inclusivity beyond religious celebrations.

title: Delhi air pollution: At peak hours, data goes blank at many stations
content: Air quality monitoring stations in Delhi experienced significant data gaps during peak pollution hours, with several stations going offline when PM2.5 and PM10 levels neared 1,000 µg/m³. Experts allege this skews 24-hour averages and hinders understanding of pollution's impact. Authorities, however, deny any missing data.

title: Watch: Disturbed by firecrackers, stray dog boards metro in Kolkata
content: Caught on camera during the festivities of Diwali, a stray dog’s unexpected ride on the Kolkata Metro has melted hearts online. Seeking refuge from bursting fireworks, the canine commuter wandered through compartments in search of calm, winning over every commuter along the way. Watch the touching moment that’s reminding everyone what compassion looks like this Diwali.

title: Are Fortnite servers not responding? How to fix on PS5, PC and Xbox
content: Fortnite players facing server connection problems can find solutions here. The article outlines common reasons for outages, including Epic Games maintenance and network issues. It provides step-by-step fixes for PS5, PC, and Xbox users. Simple restarts, checking internet connections, and reinstalling the game are suggested. Players are advised to be patient during updates as issues often resolve quickly.

title: 'Tufat al-Muminat': JeM launches online 'jihadi course' for women; will charge PKR 500
content: Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammed has launched an online training course, 'Tufat al-Muminat,' led by Masood Azhar's sister, to recruit women and raise funds. This initiative, following the formation of its women's wing, signals a strategic shift, potentially involving female suicide attackers. The group continues to operate and solicit donations openly, despite international scrutiny.

title: Eknath Chitnis passes away: Isro pioneer was 100; built India’s first telecom satellite
content: Isro scientist Dr Eknath Chitnis has passed away at the age of 100. He was a foundational figure at the Indian Space Research Organisation. Dr Chitnis worked with Dr Homi Bhabha in the early days. He was instrumental in developing India's first telecommunication satellite, INSAT. This satellite advanced the nation's space communication capabilities.

title: Stephen A Smith’s bold take: Dak Prescott, Cowboys won’t win NFC East title
content: Despite Dak Prescott's strong offensive performance, Stephen A. Smith expressed doubt about the Dallas Cowboys winning the NFC East, citing their historically bad defense. Smith highlighted the team's league-worst defensive statistics, arguing that offensive prowess alone cannot overcome these significant flaws. The Cowboys face a crucial test against the Denver Broncos.

title: IND vs AUS: Why India will level ODI series in Adelaide - here are the numbers
content: India faces a crucial second ODI against Australia at Adelaide, needing a series-saving performance from veterans Kohli and Sharma after their Perth defeat. The team grapples with the absence of Pandya and the Adelaide pitch's expected challenges. Australia welcomes back Zampa and Carey, while India ponders bowling options amid batting concerns.

title: Watch: Neeraj Chopra conferred honorary rank of Lt Colonel in Army
content: Olympic champion Neeraj Chopra has been appointed Lieutenant Colonel (Honorary) in the Indian Army. This honour follows his distinguished military career and numerous athletic achievements. Chopra's journey includes significant awards like the Arjuna Award, Khel Ratna, and Padma Shri. His recent participation in the World Athletics Championships also saw him compete strongly.

title: Mike Trout reveals shocking details on Tyler Skaggs’ fentanyl death
content: Baseball star Mike Trout gave emotional testimony in a California courtroom. He spoke about the 2019 death of his teammate Tyler Skaggs. Skaggs died from a drug overdose. The trial will decide if the Los Angeles Angels are responsible. Former team employee Eric Kay is accused of providing the fatal pill. Skaggs' family seeks damages.

title: Louvre heist: Museum reopens 3 days after jewellery heist
content: The Louvre reopened after a three-day closure due to the theft of royal jewels. The Apollo Gallery remains shut following a daylight heist where thieves used an extendable ladder and power tools to steal eight priceless pieces. The incident highlights ongoing security upgrade delays and concerns about the museum's obsolescence.

title: Why global apps showed Delhi’s AQI levels at 2,000+, but CPCB under 400
content: Delhi residents were confused by vastly different pollution readings on Tuesday. While India's CPCB showed AQI below 400, international apps like IQAir reported over 2,000. Experts explain these discrepancies stem from different calculation methods and data sources, though both indicate dangerously poor air quality post-Diwali.

title: Kiran Mazumdar offers money to fix Bengaluru roads; Chidambaram says problem is execution
content: Biocon chairperson Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw has offered to fund repairs for Bengaluru's damaged roads, prompting a proposal from P Chidambaram for industry to supervise public works. This initiative aims to improve project execution and accountability, addressing the city's persistent infrastructure issues amid public frustration.

title: 'I have been critical of Modi because ... ' : Zohran Mamdani attends Diwali event in New York
content: New York State Assembly member Zohran Mamdani has drawn controversy for criticizing Prime Minister Narendra Modi's vision of India, stating it lacks room for all citizens. Mamdani, running for New York City mayor, emphasizes his campaign's commitment to pluralism and representing all New Yorkers, regardless of their views on Modi.

title: Gold and silver rate outlook: Where are prices headed after Diwali rally fizzles?
content: Gold and silver prices are experiencing a temporary correction after a significant rally, with experts predicting a strong long-term outlook. Despite recent dips, global demand, central bank buying, and geopolitical factors are expected to support further price increases for gold. Silver also saw a substantial rise and may consolidate before resuming an upward trend.

title: 'Want to be nice to China': Trump amid 155% glooming tariffs
content: President Trump expressed a desire for amicable relations with China but criticized the nation's past trade practices, attributing them to a lack of business acumen in previous US leadership. He highlighted significant tariff revenues, suggesting potential distributions to citizens. Trump also indicated India has reduced Russian oil purchases, aligning with his desire for peace in Ukraine. A potential trade deal with China is anticipated at the upcoming APEC summit.

title: Trump pressured Zelenskyy to give up eastern Donbas in 'tense' meeting
content: A senior Ukrainian official revealed that President Trump urged President Zelenskyy to cede the Donbas region to Russia for peace during a tense meeting. Trump reportedly echoed Putin's talking points, warning Zelenskyy of annihilation if a deal wasn't struck. Zelenskyy left the White House without securing commitments, facing pressure for territorial concessions.

title: Lucknow: Elderly Dalit man forced to lick ground after 'accidentally unrinating' near temple
content: An elderly Dalit man was allegedly forced to lick the ground near a Lucknow temple on Diwali after being accused of urinating there. The victim's family states it was an accident due to his breathing difficulties. Police have arrested the accused, Swami Kant, and are investigating the incident, which has sparked political outrage.

title: IPL trade: Ishan Kishan returning home? Lot of interest for wicketkeeper-batter
content: Ishan Kishan is attracting interest from multiple IPL franchises ahead of the mini-auction, with Mumbai Indians leading the chase to bring the wicketkeeper-batter back. Despite a mixed spell at SRH, Kishan’s strong Ranji form and past success with MI make him a valuable top-order option. Talks hinge on SRH’s willingness and Kishan’s own decision to move.

title: 'I got very angry': Trump reacts to being rated third-best US President
content: President Donald Trump expressed significant anger after being ranked third on a "Presidential Walk of Fame," placing him behind George Washington and Abraham Lincoln.  He lamented the ranking, stating it was "less than great." Trump acknowledged the difficulty of surpassing the historical figures but vowed to try, humorously noting his administration's involvement in numerous wars.

title: 'Vile degradation': Trump ally shocked to discover MAGA's anti-India rhetoric
content: For once, D’Souza didn’t hit back. He seemed shaken. “In a career spanning forty years,” he wrote later, “I have never encountered this type of rhetoric. The Right never used to talk like this. So who on our side has legitimised this type of vile degradation?”

title: 'Activate your embassy in Kabul': Taliban urges US to reopen mission; seeks trade, ties
content: The Taliban's interim government in Afghanistan has expressed a desire for good economic and political ties with the US, urging Washington to reopen its embassy in Kabul instead of focusing on Bagram Airbase. This comes as India has upgraded its technical mission in Kabul to a full embassy, signaling strengthened bilateral engagement.

title: Hardik Pandya comeback: Cricketer to spend four weeks at BCCI's CoE
content: Hardik Pandya is undergoing a four-week rehabilitation at the BCCI Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru for his quadriceps injury, with no surgery required. He is expected to be fit for the upcoming white-ball series against South Africa, aiming for complete match fitness after picking up the injury during the Asia Cup.

title: Popular Punjabi singer Teji Kahlon shot at in Canada: Bullets pumped into stomach
content: Punjabi singer Teji Kahlon was shot in Canada by associates of gangster Rohit Godara, who claimed Kahlon supplied weapons and money to rival gangs and acted as an informant. This incident highlights an ongoing transnational gang feud, following the recent murder of businessman Ramesh Rulania in Rajasthan, also suspected to be linked to Godara's gang.

title: Tourists, Camels, Horses Converge As Rajasthan's Iconic Pushkar Fair Begins
content: The three-week annual Pushkar Fair, one of Rajasthan's biggest draws on the tourism calendar, kicked off in Ajmer on Wednesday.

title: Mehul Choksi Complained About Indian Jails. See Where He Will Be Imprisoned
content: Fugitive diamond merchant Mehul Choksi has suffered a big setback in his plea against extradition to India. A Belgium court has said there are no legal barriers and the charges against him were serious enough to justify it.

title: 7 Injured As Part Of Old Residential Building Collapses In Mumbai
content: Seven persons were injured after a portion of an old residential building collapsed in central Mumbai on Wednesday afternoon, civic officials said.

title: Barefoot And In Uniform, Kerala Nun Jumps Hurdles At Athletics Meet
content: Kerala nun Sister Sabina stunned audiences when she dashed ahead and jumped over hurdles effortlessly at an athletics meet.

title: Chennai Man Kills Wife, 2 Sons, Then Dies By Suicide. Cops Say He Was In Debt
content: A 45-year-old man allegedly killed his 35-year-old wife and their two sons, aged 14 and 11, before ending his life by slitting his throat at their home here, police said on Wednesday.

title: 'Waterlogging Due To Songs?' RJD's Star Candidate Trashes Vulgarity Charge
content: Shatrughan Kumar Yadav aka Khesari Lal Yadav, the popular Bhojpuri actor-singer set to make a poll debut in the Bihar election, has countered his rivals' political attacks over the vulgar content in his songs

title: "Did It Because Of Her Parents": 22-Year-Old Man Kills Wife, Dies By Suicide
content: A 22-year-old man allegedly killed his wife and later died by suicide after posting a "confession" on Instagram in Dhamtari district of Chhattisgarh, police said on Wednesday.

title: "Amiu Zubeen": Assam BJP's Rally Calls for Justice In Zubeen Garg's Death
content: The streets of Nalbari turned into a sea of emotion on Wednesday as thousands joined the "Moiu Zubeen, Amiu Zubeen" (I am Zubeen, We are Zubeen) rally, organised by the Assam BJP, seeking justice for the late music icon Zubeen Garg.

title: Trump's Call To Freeze Current Frontlines "Good Compromise": Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Wednesday he backed US President Donald Trump's proposal that the current front line should be the basis for negotiations with Russia, but said he doubted President Vladimir Putin would accept it.

title: Delhi Teen Shoots At Friend's Grandfather Over Property Dispute, Detained
content: A teenage boy was apprehended for allegedly opening fire at another boy's 75-year-old grandfather over a long-standing property dispute in central Delhi's Chandni Mahal area, police said on Wednesday.

title: Cook On Karnataka Government Contract Suspended For Attending RSS Event
content: A cook at a Karnataka hostel was suspended over his participation in a Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) event.

title: Woman Kills 65-Year-Old Bihar Man With Sword After Argument Over Samosa
content: A 65-year-old farmer in Bihar has been murdered after a dispute broke out over a samosa. The accused woman is on the run.

title: Woman Doctor Assaulted, Threatened With Rape At Bengal Hospital, 3 Arrested
content: Three people have been arrested in West Bengal's Uluberia for allegedly assaulting a woman doctor at a state-run hospital and threatening her with rape

title: Louvre Robbers' "Dhoom"-Style Escape On Scooters. AI Video Goes Viral
content: The Louvre in Paris reopened for visitors on Wednesday morning, three days after it was shuttered following an audacious daylight heist where thieves fled with precious royal jewellery worth over $100 million in just seven minutes.

title: Congress Leader's "Surname" Charge Over Sarfaraz Khan Snub And A Gambhir Dig
content: Congress leader Shama Mohamed has alleged religious bias in the selection process of the Indian cricket team after middle-order batter Sarfaraz Khan was left out of the recently announced squads.

title: Karnataka Congress MLA Flags Rs 900 Crore Fund Crunch In Free Bus Travel Scheme
content: According to the Congress leader, the corporation is struggling to break even and urged the government to release the pending funds.

title: Flier Recounts "Scary" Moment Boeing 737 Windscreen Cracked Mid-Air
content: Flight UA1093, flying from Denver to Los Angeles, was carrying 134 passengers and six crew members when a loud impact startled those on board.

title: What Is ChatGPT Atlas, OpenAI's AI-Powered "Super-Assistant" Web Browser
content: Atlas is a web browser with ChatGPT embedded throughout, allowing users to interact with the AI assistant directly on any webpage.

title: Finding Jewels And Brazen Thieves In Louvre Heist Is A Race Against Time
content: The glittering sapphires, emeralds, and diamonds that once adorned France's royals could well be gone forever, experts say after a brazen, 4-minute heist in broad daylight left the nation stunned and the government struggling to explain a new debacle

title: Chhath Puja To Be Performed At 1,500 Ghats Across Delhi
content: The Delhi BJP on Wednesday said this year's Chhath Puja celebrations will be organised at around 1,500 ghats across the city.

title: Satish Jarkiholi well-suited to provide leadership to politics of liberal, progressive ideology: Yathindra Siddaramaiah
content: ‘My father is in the last phase of his political career,’ CM Siddaramaiah’s son said; clarified that he did not name Satish Jarkiholi as his father’s successor

title: Kingpin of ₹300‑crore multi-State fraud arrested after six months on the run
content: Sri Sathya Sai police apprehend Morimi Shetty Suresh, alias Dal Mill Suri, in Warangal; 57 cases filed across five States, with steps underway to seize his properties.

title: More than 70 persons injured in Vellore and nearby districts while bursting crackers
content: Among the injured, many patients were treated for burns, eye injuries, and minor trauma resulting from firecracker mishaps.

title: IT Minister Lokesh moots Griffith University India Centre in Andhra Pradesh
content: The Minister, during his ongoing tour of Australia, meets top officials of Griffith University, James Cook University, and Populous Architects, and pushes for collaboration in education, aquaculture, and sports infrastructure

title: Traffic restrictions issued for heavy vehicles in Gudiyatham
content: According to a press release, traffic restrictions for heavy vehicles are aimed to facilitate smooth flow of traffic in Gudiyatham town

title: Two tonnes of firecrackers seized from residential area near Walajah
content: In the wake of the death of four persons after a fire broke out at an illegal cracker godown near Avadi, Collector J. U. Chandrakala formed special teams to crack such illegal godowns in the district.

title: IT Rules 2021 amends to add ‘accountability’ for State, Central governments
content: The move is aimed at curbing overreach by junior police officials at the State level, and introduces a periodic review of social media takedown notices, said officials

title: Telangana abolishes transport check posts to enhance transparency and efficiency
content: The Transport department will now turn to artificial intelligence tools and surveillance to record who enters and exits offices of the department

title: Belgian court rules Mehul Choksi faces no risk of unfair trial in India
content: Decision strengthens India’s case for extradition of the fugitive diamantaire in ₹13,000 crore PNB scam

title: Palaniswami levelling false allegations on paddy procurement: T.N. Agriculture Minister
content: In the last four-and-a-half years, the DMK government has taken prompt action in matters related to paddy procurement, says M.R.K. Panneerselvam

title: Government to procure six fast patrol boats for armed forces, issues Request for Proposal
content: According to the the Request for Proposal issued, the boat shall also be employed to carry out patrolling and surveillance of conflict zone

title: Thamarassery clash: MP seeks district administration’s intervention
content: He claims that pollution issues related to the slaughterhouse waste management company have been troubling residents for long

title: Delhi High Court judge Prathiba M. Singh appointed as chair of WIPO’s advisory board
content: Apart from Justice Singh, the board includes nine other members who will provide guidance and direction to World Intellectual Property Organization’s work with judiciaries

title: BJP Bengal chief warns party leaders over laxity during proposed SIR drive
content: He reportedly warned that any negligence in implementing the SIR could prove politically disastrous for the party in the run-up to the 2026 assembly polls

title: Karnataka envious of Andhra Pradesh’s success in attracting investments, says BJP State chief Madhav
content: By roping in some of the world’s most prominent companies to invest in Andhra Pradesh, the coalition government has proved its capability to transform the State into a preferred destination for global entrepreneurs, he says

title: When the Louvre thieves missed grabbing the diamonds from Golconda
content: While the history of the Kohinoor diamond has a few missing pages, the Pitt Regent has a continuous history from 1701 onwards when it made its appearance in colonial Madras where the Governor was Thomas Pitt

title: Bengaluru police inspector accused of cheating woman
content: The victim said that she met the officer, identified as Sunil H.B., when she went to file a complaint against a person a year and a half ago.

title: Global firms setting up innovation and technology hubs in Telangana: IT Minister
content: Sridhar Babu, who is on an official visit to Australia, met industry representatives as well as presided over the signing of LoI between Telangana government and RMIT University, Melbourne

title: NHRC member reviews investigation into hidden camera case at Apollo University
content: Vijaya Bharathi Sayani visits campus, meets students and officials, and calls for a transparent, time-bound probe into the privacy breach

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Chittoor district targets 50% green cover by 2047 under Mission Haritha Andhra Pradesh
content: Collector urges coordinated efforts, mass plantation drives, and youth participation to boost district’s green cover from the current 34%

title: No risk that Mehul Choksi won’t get fair trial in India after extradition: Belgian court
content: The Court of Appeals has held that the documents Choksi submitted do not substantiate his claims that he is the subject of a political trial

title: Punjab Police bust cross-border weapons smuggling network, four held
content: Preliminary investigation reveals that the arrested accused were working on the directions of a Pakistan-based smuggler who had been orchestrating cross-border weapons movement into Punjab

title: Kiren Rijiju on two-day visit to Mizoram for Dampa bypoll campaign
content: Other central BJP leaders, including Union Science and Technology and Earth Sciences Minister Jitendra Singh, will also visit Mizoram to campaign for BJP candidate Lalhmangaiha

title: Prosumers in Kerala slam draft renewable energy regulations at physical hearing held by Kerala State Electricity Regulatory Commission
content: The draft regulations contained proposals for restricting the Net Metering System to 3 kW, imposing a ‘grid support charge’ of ₹1 for every unit of renewable energy exported to the grid and certain conditions related to battery storage

title: Clash at poultry waste rendering unit in Kozhikode: Police book 321 suspects, including DYFI leader
content: Special squad formed under the supervision of DIG Yathish Chandra on the look out of more suspects after gathering surveillance camera visuals from the protest spot

title: Supreme Court grants time to M.P. High Court to implement order on visually impaired persons in judiciary
content: A Bench of justices J.B. Pardiwala and K.V. Viswanathan noted the submission of the counsel appearing for the High Court that it was in the process of finalising the rules in consultation with the state government

title: Four days of faith and festivity: Hyderabad gears up for Chhath Puja from October 25-28
content: Chhath Puja is dedicated to the Sun God (Surya) and his consort Ushas, the first light of dawn, as devotees express gratitude for sustaining life on earth

title: Veteran space scientist Eknath Vasant Chitnis dies at 100
content: A Padma Bhushan recipient, he played a crucial role in the early years of the Indian National Committee for Space Research (INCOSPAR) which later transformed into the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO)

title: Karnataka State Travel Operators Association urges Finance Ministry to include mid-sized vehicles under GST 2.0 concessions
content: In a recent letter to the Union Finance Ministry, the association termed the move classifying these vehicles as luxury passenger cars instead of essential tourism fleet vehicles as ‘grave injustice’ to the travel and tourism industry

title: From ruin to recovery: How a parasitic wasp saved South India’s tapioca crops
content: Cassava, better known as tapioca, is grown on about 1.73 lakh hectares in India, with Tamil Nadu and Kerala together contributing more than 90% of total production. Before the outbreak, yields averaged 35 tonnes per hectare, far above the global average of 10.76 tonnes

title: Sony Music refuses to share with Ilaiyaraaja details of revenue earned by ‘exploiting’ his songs
content: Justice N. Senthilkumar of the Madras High Court too decides not to open a sealed cover in which the statement of accounts were presented before him.

title: Two persons arrested for rape of woman in Bengaluru, three others on the run
content: The woman raised a complaint following which a police team led by Superintendent of Police C.K. Baba rushed to the spot, took stock of the situation, and tracked down two of the accused within hours in a night-long operation

title: RSS patriotic organisation, moves to curb its activities condemnable: Eknath Shinde
content: The comments by the Shiv Sena chief come days after the Karnataka Cabinet decided to restrict RSS activities in government institutions and public spaces

title: PM SHRI, NEP should be implemented in Kerala: Vellappally Natesan
content: The CPI’s opposition to the NEP will disappear once the Kerala Chief Minister holds talks with them. The CPI ultimately agrees to everything, says the SNDP Yogam general secretary

title: Supreme Court seeks Centre's assistance on PIL seeking nationwide ban on online gambling
content: The plea has also sought directions to the RBI, NPCI, and UPI platforms to disallow any monetary transactions involving unregistered gaming applications

title: Students escape unhurt in school bus accident near Coimbatore
content: The bus collided with a divider separating the highway from a service road as the driver tried to navigate the vehicle onto the service road

title: Olympic medallist Neeraj Chopra conferred rank of Lieutenant Colonel
content: Star javelin thrower Neeraj Chopra was honoured with the rank of Lieutenant Colonel recognising his contributions to sports and national pride

title: Opposition raises spectre of corruption against Kochi Corporation as Kerala local body poll looms large
content: UDF alleges Kochi Corporation has come under the scanner of VACB during the five-year term of LDF govt. LDF, however, dismisses allegation as baseless

title: Cook at Karnataka government hostel relieved from service for taking part in RSS march in Bidar’s Basavakalyan
content: The action follows a complaint received by the District Backward Classes Welfare Officer via WhatsApp on October 20, 2025, regarding Pramod Kumar's participation in the march.

title: Odisha Police arrest 12 persons in murder case of State Bar Council member Pitabas Panda
content: Former MLA, former mayor and sitting corporator have been arrested for plotting the killing, as police say they thought the deceased would have hampered their political growth

title: IT Ministry proposes strict rules for labelling deepfakes amid AI misuse
content: The proposed rules mandate social media companies to require their users to declare if they are uploading deepfake content

title: NDA seat-sharing deal in Bihar: How many seats each party is contesting?
content: Nitish Kumar’s JD(U) party has mostly contested more seats than the BJP, but the 2025 seat deal is a move towards parity within the alliance.

title: Telangana CM sets two year deadline for completion of OGH new complex
content: Planning for the new complex should encompass its connectivity from different parts of the city, says the Chief Minister

title: Kerala govt to dissolve State Level Monitoring Committee on solid waste management
content: Decision is based on government’s inference that robust institutional frameworks are already operational in Kerala

title: Will take up issues related to paddy procurement with T.N. govt.: Palaniswami tells farmers
content: Food Minister R. Sakkarapani, however, denied the Leader of Opposition’s statements pertaining to the paddy procurement process

title: Protests by Valmiki Samaj against former MP Ramesh Katti’s alleged abusive statement in Karnataka
content: The complaint states that while talking to his supporters after the polling was over, Ramesh Katti used obscene words against the entire Valmiki community while trying to criticise the Jarkiholi brothers

title: Ex-Punjab DGP denies role in son's death, says SIT probe to reveal truth
content: Former Punjab Police chief Mohammad Mustafa denies involvement in his son Aqil Akhter’s death, asserting a probe will clarify the situation after allegations of drug overdose and family conflict emerges

title: Kerala to be declared free from extreme poverty on November 1
content: CM Pinarayi Vijayan to declare Kerala free from extreme poverty at a function in Thiruvananthapuram. Actors Mohanlal, Mammootty, and Kamal Haasan will be special guests

title: Textile showroom’s warehouse catches fire in Coimbatore
content: The fire was reported at Maha Sree Laxmi Silks on Oppanakara Street, one of the busiest shopping areas in the city

title: Haryana worst hit by post-Deepavali air pollution as 10 cities from State among India’s 16 most polluted
content: Jind, around 130 km north-west of Delhi, fared the worst on CPCB’s daily Air Quality Index (AQI) for October 21

title: IMD issues red alert for six districts in Andhra Pradesh
content: The IMD also issued an orange alert for the districts of Kurnool, Nandyal, Anantapur, Sri Sathya Sai and Bapatla for October 22

title: Torrential rains lash Tamil Nadu as Northeast monsoon intensifies
content: The floodgates of Chennai’s two reservoirs have been opened wider. Red alert for Ranipet, Tiruvallur districts and orange alert for many north Tamil Nadu districts including Chennai, till 8.30 a.m. on October 23

title: Tejashwi Yadav promises to make contractual employers permanent in Bihar
content: RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav says there are no disputes within the Opposition alliance, Mahagathbandhan, and all questions will be settled by Thursday (October 23, 2025)

title: Supreme Court Collegium’s shift in Justice Sreedharan’s appointment raises concerns over Executive influence in judicial independence
content: Supreme Court Collegium’s reversal on Justice Atul Sreedharan’s transfer amid government requests raises concerns over judicial independence and political interference in appointments

title: Undertrial prisoner escapes from sub-jail in Odisha
content: “A prisoner escaped from the sub-jail by jumping over the prison wall with the help of a blanket,” say police

title: Jubilee Hills byelection turns protest ground for several sections
content: Pensioners who have not received their retirement benefits, people set to lose their properties to RRR project, those opposing Pharma City project and unemployed youth are among the protestors who filed nominations

title: Indian embassy in Kabul will help ‘regional peace’: Taliban spokesperson Suhail Shaheen
content: It is a rightful step to put bilateral relations on normal track, build trust, promote trade and cooperation and play a constructive role in regional peace,” says

title: Scheduled Caste man thrashed, forced to drink urine in Madhya Pradesh; three arrested
content: “Three persons abducted the victim from Gwalior and brought him to Bhind in a vehicle, where he was beaten up and forced to drink urine,” says Additional Superintendent of Police

title: Siddaramaiah government resorting to misinformation campaign in Karnataka unable to digest GST reforms: Capt. Brijesh Chowta
content: While Karnataka’s representatives had endorsed the reforms at GST Council, Siddaraimah’s attack follows political insecurity, the MP alleges

title: Helicopter carrying President Droupadi Murmu gets stuck on helipad during Sabarimala visit
content: Chopper made a safe touchdown at newly prepared helipad around 9.05 a.m., but its tyres sank slightly into freshly laid concrete soon after President disembarked. President, however, continued her journey to Pampa by road without any delay

title: While Modi conceals, Trump reveals: Congress after U.S. President repeats Russian oil claims
content: The PM has finally acknowledged publicly that President Trump called him up and that the two spoke to each other, says Congress leader Jairam Ramesh

title: Two cases of corporal punishment faced by nine-year-olds belatedly come to light in Karnataka
content: Teacher of a residential school in Chitradurga was arrested on Tuesday for brutally assaulting a nine-year-old for calling home

title: Trump dials PM Modi for Deepavali, claims they discussed trade and Russian oil
content: Differences in readouts as Prime Minister cites fight against terrorism, the U.S. President says “no India Pakistan war”

title: Tullis-Joyce's rise to USWNT, Man United No. 1 (via a rainforest)
content: the summer break offers the opportunity to jet off to glitzy locations like Ibiza or Dubai . the 29-year-old goalkeeper is a real fan favorite at the club . she has been working with a researcher called Dr. Rosa Vásquez Espinoza .

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do after Week 8
content: a team with Would be in status is featured in this week's top-12 projection . teams with Work to do are the true bubble teams and the first ones outside the bracket . one team with work to do is passing the eye test and has a chance at winning its conference .

title: H-1B fears cool, companies hiring from US campuses to gain
content: Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: What we're hearing on the WNBA's CBA negotiations
content: a year ago, the WNBA players' association announced the players would opt out of their current collective bargaining agreement with the league that was set to expire following the 2025 season . the players outlined their desire for a new economic model based on equity . there are no signs a deal will be put in place by the date that the current deal expires, on Oct. 31 .

title: Ranking the 6 UFC championship fights still to come in 2025
content: Virna Jandiroba will meet virna jandaroba for the 115-pound title that Zhang Weili vacated earlier this year to move up to flyweight . former lightweight champion islam Makhachev will challenge welterweight titleholder Jack Della Maddalena at the uFC 322 on Nov. 1 .

title: Which NHL teams have the most to prove in 2025-26? Placing 13 teams into tiers
content: few teams in NHL history have proved themselves in the face of doubters more than the Florida Panthers of the past few seasons . this season will be defined by the teams outside of South Florida that need to do a lot of proving of their own .

title: H-1B visa: US lawmakers urge Trump to scrap $100K fee; flag 3 big risks
content: Lubna Kably is a senior editor, who focuses on various policies and legislation. In particular, she writes extensively on immigration and tax policies. The Indian diaspora is the largest in the world; through her articles she demystifies the immigration-policy related developments in select countries for outbound students, job aspirants and employees. She also analyses the impact of Income-tax and GST related developments for individuals and business entities. Read More

title: Where Dodgers-Blue Jays ranks among best World Series matchups since 2000
content: Los Angeles Dodgers and the Toronto Blue Jays will have an epic World Series . none of the past five World Series went longer than six games . the blue Jays are hoping to become the first repeat champion in 25 years .

title: The NBA season is here! Expert picks for East, West and NBA champs
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder begin their quest to repeat against Kevin Durant and the Houston Rockets . they re-signed 2025 MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , All-Star Jalen Williams and Chet Holmgren to deals worth nearly $800 million . in the loaded Western Conference, Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors begin their first full campaign with Jimmy Butler .

title: Ranking every open Power 4 job in college football
content: all four power conferences have had a firing in the first half of the season . no coach is safe, but a strong line of storms has been forecasted . a total of 298-150 coaches have been fired from the power conference .
